citations.narrative:
The facility has a written program of veterinary care (PVC) that has notes from the attending veterinarian (AV) and has
had regularly scheduled visits, physical exams and animal records demonstrating that they currently have an AV, however
the written PVC available has not been signed by the AV. The PVC is required to be signed by the AV to help maintain
that the procedures and schedules in place are formally approved by the AV. Ensure to work with the attending
veterinarian to review and sign the written PVC.
***Correct by September 23, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.13(a) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The facility has a written program of veterinary care (PVC) that has notes from the attending veterinarian (AV) and has 
had regularly scheduled visits, physical exams and animal records demonstrating that they currently have an AV, however 
the written PVC available has not been signed by the AV. The PVC is required to be signed by the AV to help maintain 
that the procedures and schedules in place are formally approved by the AV. Ensure to work with the attending 
veterinarian to review and sign the written PVC.  
***Correct by September 23, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
